name: David Ramirez
text: This is from an analytics article on Hunger Games that also compares it with Twilight and Rowling  =)    The most amusing comments suggest combining sentences from the 3. Or mix and match across the different tables from the 3.    It's possible to assemble a pretty darn dirty passage if you take 3 things (by author) from each table.      http://www.slate.com/articles/arts/culturebox/2013/11/hunger_games_catching_fire_a_textual_analysis_of_suzanne_collins_novels.html
